heading.title: Essential features for you
heading.description: There are many things that are important to catalog design. Your images must be sharp and appealing.

content.title: Favorite PostsTitle
content.description: It's a useful feature for your customers: They can SAVE an useful article and easily reach it in future under Favorite Store.

content.title: Recently Viewed
content.description: Every time visits an article, HSBlog will remember it. Customers can easily reach it next time under Recently Reviewed area.

content.title: Awesome Mega Menu
content.description: A useful feature helps you can add more information to your menu but still keep it simple and clean

content.title: Theme Options
content.description: Here you can customize Header Style, Footer Style, Heading Tags's Font, Social Networks, MailChimp, Youtube and much more ....

content.title: Social Login
content.description: In addition Default WordPress Login, Customer can easily signin / signup to your site with their Facebook and Apple.

content.title: Google reCaptcha V3
content.description: Protects your site website forms from spam entries while letting real people pass through with ease
